title.zh: 南昌：第36个世界血友病日主题活动
title.en: Nanchang: 36th World Hemophilia Day Memorial Event

subtitle.zh: 2024年关注罕见病大健康多省市交流高峰会
subtitle.en: 2024 Multi-Provincial Health Summit on Rare Diseases

description.zh: 由南昌市血之友公益协会主办的“纪念第36个世界血友病日主题活动&2024年关注罕见病大健康多省市交流高峰会”在南昌成功举办。左钰洁首次提出了《关爱女性血友病，关爱我们的母亲、姐妹和女儿》的倡议宣讲，并发布许多论文、文献的翻译，包括ISTH-BAT（国际血栓与止血学会-出血评估工具）量表的翻译。
description.en: The 36th World Hemophilia Day Memorial Event & 2024 Multi-Provincial Health Summit on Rare Diseases was successfully held in Nanchang, hosted by Nanchang Hemophilia Association. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo presented the initiative 'Caring for Women with Hemophilia, Caring for Our Mothers, Sisters and Daughters' for the first time, showcasing translations of numerous papers and literature, and releasing the Chinese translation of the ISTH-BAT (International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis - Bleeding Assessment Tool) scale.
